version_description:
- Tap on an affirmation to copy it easily
- iOS 8 support
Minor fixes

Now you can add your own list of affirmations!
Simply go to the list of affirmations by tapping on the quote and add what inspires you.
We are sorry to announce that, due to external reasons, we are no longer able to provide mPLUS points. We hope you can continue enjoying this app and stay tuned for new updates coming soon!
Fixed reminders for iOS 11 and added the ability to delete custom affirmations
Allowing to save images on iOS 11
Bug fixes and improvements
Choose your favorite font, color and set background photos!

- New Styles!
- Refreshed look!

- Check out the new Today extension widget!
- New reminder sounds to choose from
- Send affirmations directly from our new iMessage app
Improved reminders, affirmation selection and added many new themes!

This is a big update!
Explore affirmations from different categories, add to favorites, change themes and enjoy the new design!
Love the app? Rate us! We read every review.

- Improved design
- Added new category for night affirmations
- Allowing to change themes for free
- Bug fixing
